p: Since the 3D structure of the active site of the enzyme is crucial for catalytic activity, we proceeded to a comparison of the SARS-CoV-2 main protease, Mpro, with the HIV-1 protease, the HCV protease (NS3 protein) and the human proteases DPP-4, thrombin, Factor Xa, renin and ACE, which constitute known drug targets with approved inhibitors.
